title: Kenya Counties API
description: Fast and reliable REST API serving demographic, economic, and spatial data for all 47 counties in Kenya. Built with Go for high performance, this API enables data-driven applications with comprehensive geospatial datasets and real-time county statistics.

title: KNBS Open Data API
description: A RESTful API providing structured access to Kenya National Bureau of Statistics datasets. Transforms complex statistical data into developer-friendly endpoints for seamless integration into analysis tools, dashboards, and visualization platforms.
